translateEnLandingPage.cvTipsIntro: Questions and advice on drafting your CV
translateEnLandingPage.whatIsCV: What is a CV and where does the term come from?
translateEnLandingPage.cvDescription: CV, short for 'curriculum vitae', comes from Latin and represents 'the course of life'. It offers an overview of a person's career path, containing details about education, skills, professional experience, and key abilities.
translateEnLandingPage.howToWriteCV: What should I include in my curriculum vitae?
translateEnLandingPage.cvWritingTips: Your CV should only contain information important to potential employers. This means your CV may differ from one application to another. However, at a minimum, your CV should include personal information, a list of professional experiences, and your educational background.
translateEnLandingPage.personalInfoDetail: Make sure that your CV includes your full name, email address, and mobile phone number. It is advisable to also mention your home address, as some employers may prefer candidates who live nearby. If the job requires a driving license, do not forget to include it. Additionally, if you have a professional LinkedIn profile or a personal website, it is useful to add a link to these in the personal information section.
translateEnLandingPage.professionalExpDetails: List your professional experiences in reverse order, starting with the most recent job and moving backwards. For each position held, provide a brief description of your role, highlighting the main tasks, responsibilities held, and skills acquired. A valuable tip is to emphasize those specific skills and duties that are relevant to the targeted position.
translateEnLandingPage.studiesDetails1: Similar to the section on professional experience, begin detailing your education with the most recent level of studies or the highest educational degree obtained. Mention the educational institution attended, the period of study, from start to finish.
translateEnLandingPage.studiesDetails2: These essential details should be included in the CV for each application. However, to distinguish yourself from other candidates, it is recommended to make additional efforts. If you want to convince potential employers that you are the ideal candidate for the position, consider adding extra sections to your CV.
translateEnLandingPage.skillsDetails: Obviously, each job is unique. However, throughout your career, you accumulate skills and abilities that are applicable in various contexts. These valuable qualities are formed from experience and contribute to improving your performance in any new professional role.
translateEnLandingPage.coursesDetails: Many employers provide courses or training programs to develop specific competencies of their employees. If you have participated in such training and have honed skills relevant to the job you are applying for, don't forget to add them to your CV. It is important to specify whether you received a diploma or certificate as a result of these courses.
translateEnLandingPage.personalActivitiesDetails: You can also gain skills and competencies in non-professional contexts. Activities such as volunteering, where you might have served as a coach, instructor, or accountant for various clubs or organizations, contribute to your development. If these experiences occurred during your studies, they are seen as extracurricular activities. Don't forget to mention them in your CV, along with the skills you developed through them.
translateEnLandingPage.hrCheck: What do recruiters check before hiring you?
translateEnLandingPage.usingGoogle: Recruiters frequently use Google to find information about candidates. Online verification is becoming a common practice in the recruitment process.
translateEnLandingPage.linkInProfile: The Role of the LinkedIn Profile:
translateEnLandingPage.linkInDetail: LinkedIn is increasingly used for managerial and administrative positions. A well-maintained LinkedIn profile, featuring valuable professional content and engagement in industry-specific discussions, can capture the attention of recruiters.
translateEnLandingPage.facebookRole: The Role of the Facebook Profile:
translateEnLandingPage.facebookDetails: Although it can provide information about the candidate, Facebook is not as relevant for recruiters. Inappropriate behavior on Facebook can negatively influence recruiters' perception.
translateEnLandingPage.screeningMethods: The most relevant method of background screening involves combining background checks and reference verifications. This includes both direct contact with the candidate and informal verification through the recruiter's professional networks.
translateEnLandingPage.recommandationNeedsDetails: Recommendations on LinkedIn are useful but not decisive. The value of a recommendation depends more on the reputation of the person providing it than on the number or exact content of the recommendation.
translateEnLandingPage.linkinInsightsDetails: LinkedIn can provide insights into a candidate's professional interests and level of engagement, but it is not very effective in assessing their personality. The profile may reflect the candidate's desire to differentiate themselves through updates and personal presentations.
translateEnLandingPage.googleSearchesDetails: Recruiters use Google searches to identify additional details about candidates' professional activities and to assess their media exposure. This information can influence the candidate's reputation and, consequently, that of the employing company.
translateEnLandingPage.removeInfos: What information to remove from your CV
translateEnLandingPage.removeInfosDetails: To increase your chances of securing an interview, it is essential to have a well-structured and concise CV. Recruiters spend very little time on each CV, so remove the following information to ensure your application stands out:
translateEnLandingPage.deleteIrrelevantJobs: Delete jobs that are not relevant to the desired position, especially if they are old. Recruiters want current and relevant information.
translateEnLandingPage.omitIrrelevantHobbies: If your hobbies are not relevant to the job in question, do not mention them. Use the space to detail relevant professional experiences and skills.
translateEnLandingPage.keepItShort: A resume over two pages, with small font and large paragraphs of text, can be quickly rejected. Keep it short and to the point.
translateEnLandingPage.avoidReferencesPhrase: Employers will request additional information if necessary, without you needing to mention this in your CV.
translateEnLandingPage.useProfessionalEmail: Use a professional email address, such as firstname.lastname@email.com, to avoid appearing unprofessional.
translateEnLandingPage.eliminateSuperfluousWords: Remove words like 'Phone' in front of the phone number or 'email address.' The format is recognized and does not require clarification.
translateEnLandingPage.avoidCompanySpecificTerms: Avoid terms specific to your current company. Use expressions and words that anyone in the field would understand.
translateEnLandingPage.includeRelevantLinksOnly: Include a link to your LinkedIn profile if relevant, but avoid links to personal Instagram, Pinterest, or Facebook accounts if they are not related to the job.
translateEnLandingPage.cvMistakesToAvoid: Remember, these CV mistakes can lead to rejection
translateEnLandingPage.focusOnResponsibilities: Focusing on responsibilities, not on results
translateEnLandingPage.sameCvForAllJobs: Sending the same CV for all jobs
translateEnLandingPage.difficultFormatting: Formatting and font that make it difficult to read

translateRoLandingPage.testimonialIntro: Cu un CV de top au ajuns repede in interviuri
translateRoLandingPage.testimonial1: Serviciu fantastic si usor de utilizat. A iesit un CV de nota 10!

translateRoLandingPage.testimonial3: Cu CV-ul creat aici, angajarea a venit rapid. Recomand cu încredere!
translateRoLandingPage.testimonial4: Serviciul vostru mi-a deschis usile succesului. Angajat intr-o saptamana!
translateRoLandingPage.increaseChancesTitle: Sporeste-ti sansele de ajunge rapid in interviuri
translateRoLandingPage.attractAttention: Atrage rapid atentia prin CV-ul creat de buildCV
translateRoLandingPage.timeEconomy: Economiseste timp si bazeaza-te pe solutiile testate
translateRoLandingPage.cvTipsIntro: Intrebari si sfaturi privind redactarea CV-ului tau
translateRoLandingPage.whatIsCV: Ce este si de unde vine termenul de CV?
translateRoLandingPage.cvDescription: CV-ul, prescurtat din 'curriculum vitae', vine din latina si reprezinta cursul vietii. El ofera o privire de ansamblu asupra parcursului profesional al unei persoane. Acesta contine detalii despre educatie, competente, experienta profesionala si abilitati cheie. CV-ul tau le permite angajatorilor sa obtina rapid o imagine clara a capacitatilor tale, experientei profesionale si cunostintelor, ajutandu-i sa decida daca te potrivesc profilului cautat pentru post si daca merita sa te invite la interviu.
translateRoLandingPage.howToWriteCV: Ce trebuie sa includ în curriculum vitae?
translateRoLandingPage.cvWritingTips: CV-ul tău trebuie să conțină doar informații importante pentru potențialul angajator.
translateRoLandingPage.personalInfoDetail: Asigura-te ca in CV-ul tau figureaza numele complet, adresa de email si numarul de telefon mobil.
translateRoLandingPage.professionalExpDetails: Listeaza experientele profesionale in ordine inversa.
translateRoLandingPage.studiesDetails1: Incepe detalierea educatiei tale cu cel mai recent nivel de studii.
translateRoLandingPage.studiesDetails2: Aceste detalii esentiale trebuie incluse in CV pentru fiecare aplicatie.
translateRoLandingPage.skillsDetails: Pe parcursul carierei, acumulezi competente si abilitati aplicabile in diverse contexte.
translateRoLandingPage.coursesDetails: Daca ai participat la asemenea instruiri si ti-ai perfecționat aptitudinile relevante pentru jobul vizat, nu uita sa le adaugi in CV.
translateRoLandingPage.personalActivitiesDetails: Poti capata competente si abilitati in contexte non-profesionale.
translateRoLandingPage.hrCheck: Ce verifică recrutorii înainte de a te angaja?
translateRoLandingPage.usingGoogle: Recrutorii folosesc frecvent Google pentru a găsi informații despre candidați. Verificarea online devine o practică comună în procesul de recrutare.
translateRoLandingPage.linkInDetail: LinkedIn-ul este tot mai utilizat pentru pozițiile manageriale și administrative. Un profil LinkedIn bine întretinut, cu continut profesional valoros si implicare in discutii de specialitate, poate atrage atenția recrutorilor.
translateRoLandingPage.facebookDetails: Desi poate oferi informatii despre candidat, Facebook nu este la fel de relevant pentru recrutori. Un comportament nepotrivit pe Facebook poate influenta negativ perceptia recrutorilor.
translateRoLandingPage.screeningMethods: Cea mai relevanta metoda de screening de fond este combinarea verificarii antecedentelor si referintelor. Aceasta implica atat contactarea directa a candidatului, cat si verificarea informala prin retelele profesionale ale recrutorului.
translateRoLandingPage.recommandationNeedsDetails: Recomandarile pe LinkedIn sunt utile, dar nu decisive. Valoarea unei recomandari depinde mai mult de reputatia persoanei care o ofera decat de numarul sau continutul exact al acesteia.
translateRoLandingPage.linkinInsightsDetails: LinkedIn poate oferi indicii despre interesele profesionale si nivelul de implicare al unui candidat, dar nu este foarte eficient in evaluarea personalitatii acestuia. Profilul poate reflecta dorinta candidatului de a se diferentia prin actualizari si prezentari personale.
translateRoLandingPage.googleSearchesDetails: Recrutorii utilizeaza cautarile pe Google pentru a identifica detalii suplimentare despre activitatea profesionala a candidatilor si pentru a evalua expunerea mediatica a acestora. Aceste informatii pot influenta reputatia candidatului si, implicit, a companiei angajatoare.
translateRoLandingPage.removeInfos: Ce informatii sa elimini din CV-ul tau
translateRoLandingPage.removeInfosDetails: Pentru a-ti creste sansele de a obtine un interviu, este esential sa ai un CV bine structurat si concis. Recruiterii aloca foarte putin timp pentru fiecare CV, asa ca elimina urmatoarele informatii pentru a te asigura ca aplicatia ta se remarca.
translateRoLandingPage.deleteIrrelevantJobs: Șterge joburile care nu sunt relevante pentru poziția dorită, mai ales dacă sunt vechi. Recrutorii vor informații actuale și relevante.
translateRoLandingPage.omitIrrelevantHobbies: Dacă hobby-urile tale nu sunt relevante pentru jobul vizat, nu le menționa. Utilizează spațiul pentru a detalia experiențele profesionale și abilitățile relevante.
translateRoLandingPage.keepItShort: Un CV de peste 2 pagini, cu font mic și paragrafe mari de text, poate fi respins rapid. Păstrează-l scurt și la obiect.
translateRoLandingPage.avoidReferencesPhrase: Angajatorii vor cere informații suplimentare dacă este necesar, fără ca tu să menționezi asta în CV.
translateRoLandingPage.useProfessionalEmail: Folosește o adresă de e-mail profesională, de tip prenume.nume@email.com, pentru a evita să pari neserios.
translateRoLandingPage.eliminateSuperfluousWords: Elimină cuvinte precum „Telefon” din fața numărului de telefon sau „adresa de e-mail”. Formatul este recunoscut și nu necesită clarificări.
translateRoLandingPage.avoidCompanySpecificTerms: Evită termeni specifici companiei tale curente. Utilizează expresii și cuvinte pe care oricine din domeniu le înțelege.
translateRoLandingPage.irrelevantSocialMediaLinks: Link-uri către conturi de social media irelevante:
translateRoLandingPage.includeRelevantLinksOnly: Include link-ul către contul de LinkedIn dacă este relevant, dar evită link-uri către conturi personale de Instagram, Pinterest sau Facebook, dacă acestea nu au legătură cu jobul.
translateRoLandingPage.cvMistakesToAvoid: Deci, nu uita aceste greșeli în CV care pot duce la respingere:
translateRoLandingPage.focusOnResponsibilities: Concentrarea pe responsabilități, nu pe rezultate
translateRoLandingPage.sameCvForAllJobs: Trimiterea aceluiași CV pentru toate joburile
translateRoLandingPage.timeSavingClaim: Ai idee cat timp castigi cu noi?
translateRoLandingPage.cvAccessibility: Folosind buildCV, vei avea un CV-ul profesional accesibil. Indiferent daca alegi sa-ti faci singur CV-ul rapid si simplu cu ajutorul nostru sau preferi ca expertii nostri sa-l customizeze, CV-ul tau va fi remarcabil.
translateRoLandingPage.priceArgument2: Nu trebuie sa iti bati capul cu aranjarea in pagina
translateRoLandingPage.priceArgument5: Pretul de 19.9 RON / descarcare, suficient sa dai skip la o inghetata!
translateRoLandingPage.tryUsOut: Te simti pregatit sa ne incerci?
translateRoLandingPage.finalizeQuickly: Finalizeaza-l rapid si aplica la jobul visurilor tale!
translateRoLandingPage.createMoreTime: Tocmai ti-ai creat mai mult timp pentru tine
